data.persona: I am the most powerful man in the country. I like that people fear me. I will destroy all that oppose me.
data.description:
You are in the Market Center.
Located in the middle of the famous Tempior Market of the Kingdom. Wooden tables line the floor and a bar serves several customers. The finest wines across the Kingdom are lined across the shelves behind the bar and a barb sings songs. The atmosphere is one of joy and camaraderie.
There's a Tavern, a bar, a Market, a Wine, a shelf, and a Tempior Market here.
The brother and the knight are here.

You are carrying a scepter and a crown, and wearing a cape.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the brother so that I can catch his attention.
data.mid_motivation: I will drink my brother to celebrate his achievements during the war.
data.long_motivation: I am planning to appoint my brother to lead the newly conquered territory and expand my control over the country.
